      • takeTurn

        public void takeTurn()
        Runs the full turn for this player. Resets ability flags, shows debug info, and executes shared turn actions.
        Overrides:
        takeTurn in class Player

      • useAbility

        protected void useAbility()
        Prompts the human player to use their character's ability (e.g. Assassin or Thief). Handles targeting logic and applies effects directly.
        Overrides:
        useAbility in class Player

      • chooseIncome

        protected void chooseIncome(Deck districtDeck)
        Prompts the player to choose income for the turn: either 2 gold or drawing cards. Handles logic for Observatory and Library effects.
        Overrides:
        chooseIncome in class Player
        Parameters:
        districtDeck - the district card districtDeck

      • buildDistrict

        public void buildDistrict()
        Empty override required for compatibility. HumanPlayer does not use this.
        Specified by:
        buildDistrict in class Player

      • buildDistrict

        public void buildDistrict(DistrictCard card)
        Builds the specified district card into the player's city. Applies cost, removes the card from hand, and handles special effects like Factory.
        Parameters:
        card - the district card to build

      • onDistrictBuilt

        public void onDistrictBuilt(DistrictCard built)
        Called when this player finishes building a district. Applies special effects based on the district's name (e.g. Bell Tower or Lighthouse).
        Overrides:
        onDistrictBuilt in class Player
        Parameters:
        built - the district that was just built

      • destroyDistrict

        public void destroyDistrict(Player target,
                            int districtIndex,
                            boolean free)
        Destroys a district in another player's city. Applies cost (unless it's a free destruction), handles special logic for Museum, Bell Tower, and Graveyard.
        Specified by:
        destroyDistrict in class Player
        Parameters:
        target - the player whose district is being destroyed
        districtIndex - index of the district in their city list
        free - true if the destruction is free (e.g. from Armory)

      • usedMagicianThisTurn

        public boolean usedMagicianThisTurn()
        Returns:
        true if the Magician ability has been used this turn

      • setUsedMagicianThisTurn

        public void setUsedMagicianThisTurn(boolean used)
        Sets whether the Magician ability was used this turn.
        Parameters:
        used - true if used, false otherwise

      • printAbilityReminders

        public void printAbilityReminders()
        Prints ability reminders based on districts the player has built. These reminders help the player remember special actions they can perform this turn.
